welcome_benefits: Get 50% of the Joining Fee Back as a PhonePe Gift Card on Your First RuPay Credit Card UPI Transaction, and the Remaining 50% as 10 Gift Cards on Continued UPI Spends

Rewards Rate: 2 RPs/₹100 on Select PhonePe Spends Like Recharges, Bill Payments, Movies, Hotels, Utilities, and More. 1 RP/₹100 on Brands Like Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Ajio, and More. 1 RP/₹100 on Scan & Pay UPI Spends
Reward Redemption: 1 Reward Point = ₹1 (Redemption Against Statement). 1 Reward Point = ₹0.30 When Redeemed for Airmiles, Product Catalogue or Smartbuy

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal Fee Waiver on Annual Spends of ₹1 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: No Charges for Reward Point Redemption Against Statement
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver on Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹5,000 (Maximum ₹250 Each Statement Cycle)

product_details: PhonePe HDFC Uno Credit Card is available on the RuPay network.
Cardholders can earn 2% Rewards on bill payments, recharges, and more through PhonePe.
Scan and Pay payments are eligible for 1% Reward Points.
